{"id":757723815,"question_id":535,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 10 months","timestamp":1658888654,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/757723815/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Encode and Decode TinyURL","memory":"42.5 MB","code":"public class Codec {\n    Map<String, String> index = new HashMap<String, String>();\n    Map<String, String> revIndex = new HashMap<String, String>();\n    static String BASE_HOST = \"http://tinyurl.com/\";\n    \n    // Encodes a URL to a shortened URL.\n    public String encode(String longUrl) {\n        if (revIndex.containsKey(longUrl)) return BASE_HOST + revIndex.get(longUrl);\n        String charSet = \"abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789\";\n        String key = null;\n        do {\n            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n            for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++) {\n                int r = (int) (Math.random() * charSet.length());\n                sb.append(charSet.charAt(r));\n            }\n            key = sb.toString();\n        } while (index.containsKey(key));\n        index.put(key, longUrl);\n        revIndex.put(longUrl, key);\n        return BASE_HOST + key;\n    }\n\n    // Decodes a shortened URL to its original URL.\n    public String decode(String shortUrl) {\n        return index.get(shortUrl.replace(BASE_HOST, \"\"));\n    }\n}\n\n// Your Codec object will be instantiated and called as such:\n// Codec codec = new Codec();\n// codec.decode(codec.encode(url));","compare_result":"","title_slug":"encode-and-decode-tinyurl","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
